name: Lagaf': Les Aventures de Moktar — Vol 1: La Zoubida
name_original: Lagaf': Les Aventures de Moktar — Vol 1: La Zoubida
description:
Official description from behind the video game box, translated from french to english:

After having fun with Lagaf ', join Moktar in his new adventures in VIDEO GAME !!! On a golden scooter and on its flying carpet, sow the chaos from Paris to Marrakech through the torrid deserts of the Sahara. Combat 45 Babymatic, the baby gunslinger, Toyo, the snake with glasses and more than 40 delirious enemies. BECOME THE SUPER-NUMBER-ONE-PLAYER AND GO TO SAVE LA ZOUBIDA!
